table.title: Table
table.description: Name of the table to be extracted

sysparm_query.title: SysParm Query
sysparm_query.description: Query which will be sent along with get table request. You can use [REST API Explorer](https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/tokyo-application-development/page/integrate/inbound-rest/task/t_GetStartedAccessExplorer.html) to try out API calls before setting up this component.

sysparm_fields.title: SysParm Fields
sysparm_fields.description: Using this parameter you can limit fetched fields. Please use comma separation.

sysparm_display_value.title: SysParm Display Value
sysparm_display_value.description: Determines the type of data returned, either the actual values from the database or the display values of the fields. Refer to [Table API documentation](https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-api-reference/page/integrate/inbound-rest/concept/c_TableAPI.html) for more info.

increment.title: Increment
increment.description: Use this parameter to define if you want to do incremental load.
